content.raw: No worries, thanks for pointing out the problem. I'm still very confused why things work on my machine (I have a feeling this is related to yesterdays puzzle). I reverted, and added the `set_target_properties` to match the current `libgazebo` target. This should work, but I didn't want to add a comment to the main PR until jenkins passed.
